name: get_values_at_timestamp
title: Get Position At Timestamp
description: Retunr the interpolated positions at the time closest to the provided timestamp

inputs.name: t_at_year
inputs.title: Year
inputs.description: The year of the provided timestamp

inputs.name: t_at_month
inputs.title: Month
inputs.description: The month of the provided timestamp

inputs.name: t_at_day
inputs.title: Day
inputs.description: The day of the provided timestamp

inputs.name: t_at_hour
inputs.title: Hour
inputs.description: The hour of the provided timestamp

inputs.name: t_at_minute
inputs.title: Minute
inputs.description: The minute of the provided timestamp

inputs.name: t_at_second
inputs.title: Second
inputs.description: The second of the provided timestamp

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the column added
